description: Alex Lambert succeeds in his assignment to rescue the hostages from their bondage. The empathetic young soldier unties Wolf Remulus who had been held prisoner and restrained for hours. He offers the freed captive some succor and a hearty dose of TLC, giving him the best suck-n-fuck heâ€™s ever experienced, restoring his vim and vigor, and more importantly, helping him forget the trauma he experienced being held against his will.
title: Basic Training, Scene #01
